name: PSW LOPA Session and Report Non SB GES None
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PSW LOPA Session and Report:[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(PSW_Only_LOPA_Scope)*>,Yes)){<* Eval((((8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Documents_Sent_by_Customer)*>)+(16+0.25*<*VALUE(High Severity Scenarios in PHA Report (1-99999))*>)+(24+2*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>)+(16+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>)+8*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>+0.1*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_LOPAs)*>*<*VALUE(PSW_Number_of_Document_Reviews_(1-5))*>*0.25))*0.9) *>}{0}[ENDIF])*>
